roleset.name: lay a garland over

role.descr: entity ornamented by garland, where placed

example.name: What's Garci? Passive, descriptive usage
example.text: A woman danced on the riverbank as [Weir]-1, garlanded *-1 in marigolds, *PRO*-1 sprinkled Garci.

example.name: Transitive, no Arg2
example.text: As leaders of various groups arrived, they garlanded a deity of Srila Prabhupada placed at one end of the courtyard.
example.arg: As leaders of various groups arrived
a deity of Srila Prabhupada placed at one end of the courtyard
